entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of light snow or rain or ice pellets changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers or ice pellets near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
